name: The Crown (bodardr)
description:
Made for the October 2020 'Jame Gam': The crown and the cursed journey.

SUPER IMPORTANT : Rotate Camera with LB, Middle Mouse Click or 'TAB' during your playthrough!

Controls :

Keyboard

Rotate Camera - Middle Mouse or 'TAB'

E - Interact

Move - WASD
Slash - Left Click

(If Equipped)
Shoot - Hold Right Click
Special - Hold Q

Run - Hold Space
Run - Tap Space

Gamepad - Recommended

Rotate Camera - LB

Move - Left Stick
Slash - 'X'

(If Equipped)
Shoot - Hold 'RT'
Special - Hold 'RB'

Run - Hold 'A'
Run - Tap 'A'

Update : Modified instructions.

Patch : Rebuilt Adressables so that all collectable weapons show up.

Patch #2 : Fixed a bug where legendaries could not drop.
